headline: Dow Jones Futures: AMD, Apple, Palantir, Tesla Are Key Movers; Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Announces New AI Chip
summary: Dow Jones Futures: AMD, Apple, Palantir and Tesla were key movers. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang announced the company's new AI chip.

headline: AMD shows off new higher performing AI chip at CES event
summary: Advanced Micro Devices CEO Lisa Su showed off a number of the company's AI chips on Monday at the CES trade show in Las ​Vegas, including its advanced MI455 AI processors, which are components in the data center server racks that ‌the company is selling to firms like ChatGPT maker OpenAI.  Su also unveiled the MI440X, a version of the MI400 series chip designed for ‌on-premise use at businesses.  The so-called enterprise version is designed to fit into infrastructure that is not specifically designed for AI clusters.

content.title: AMD shows off new higher performing AI chip at CES event
content.summary: Advanced Micro Devices CEO Lisa Su showed off a number of the company's AI chips on Monday at the CES trade show in Las ​Vegas, including its advanced MI455 AI processors, which are components in the data center server racks that ‌the company is selling to firms like ChatGPT maker OpenAI.  Su also unveiled the MI440X, a version of the MI400 series chip designed for ‌on-premise use at businesses.  The so-called enterprise version is designed to fit into infrastructure that is not specifically designed for AI clusters.

headline: AMD's Su Unveils New Tech, Talks Up AI Demand
summary: Analyst on AMD's New Tech, AI Demand DEK: Advanced Micro Devices CEO Lisa Su touted the attributes of a future generation of products, saying the pace of AI innovation has been incredible. Constellation Research founder Ray Wang provides context.

content.title: AMD's Su Unveils New Tech, Talks Up AI Demand
content.description: Analyst on AMD's New Tech, AI Demand DEK: Advanced Micro Devices CEO Lisa Su touted the attributes of a future generation of products, saying the pace of AI innovation has been incredible. Constellation Research founder Ray Wang provides context.
